website_summaries.verdict: Trusted brand made for girls that protects and looks stylish, too.
pros: Customers say that girls love the sporty look and durability of this popular surf brand
cons: Some reports of it feeling too snug around the neck

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Amazing material , beautiful color ...but it was too small . My daughter wears a size 12, I ordered up and it was just too tight . She's tall and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Viviann Soto

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised in the least bit.
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL. It's see thru. It's so tight on my daughter who actually only wears a size 10 normally. I ordered the 14 XL. I wouldn't buy this again. Not happy I spent 27.00 on something that is a bust now either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fits petite women
customer_reviews.text: I am petite and 108 pounds... it fits me perfectly. I love it... normally I buy junior clothes because of my height. The adult sizes are too big. The only problem with junior/kids sizes are the narrow shoulders and the sleeves are often shorter. But this rash guard fits petite women.... besides, it stretches with time and wear
customer_reviews.author: marimo

customer_reviews.title: Saves Her From the Sun
customer_reviews.text: Works great protecting her from the sun. Not sure if it keeps her warmer though because I haven't thrown her in the ocean yet. Maybe one day and then I'll update the post. Would buy again, or will buy a new one when she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to take to Hawaii. I am so glad I bought this. It kept her protected from the sun all day and she never once complained that it was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: clg3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but very tight.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but they are tight, as excepted since it’s for swimming. But if your child is a tad on the larger size I would go up 2 sizes. Bought a size 6 and 10 for my 5 and 9 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Mical GT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, sized way too small
customer_reviews.text: We had to order again to get a larger size to get the right fit. Roxy sizes are always too small. Why not size for an average girl and not a super skinny one?
customer_reviews.author: E. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shirt.  Too Tight.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but I'd order a size larger than you normally do. This is tight on my kid -- and given the higher neckline, that's really uncomfortable to her.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Ferriter

customer_reviews.title: Decent swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger and I still think this was tight and small. The neck hole was very tight but it did provide protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Yankey

customer_reviews.title: A little long but overall good rash guard
customer_reviews.text: Being short, the standard women's rash guards never fit me correctly. So i ordered this in size 16/XXL and it fit perfectly. I'm 5'3, 115lbs, 33" chest. Still a bit long but sleeves fit. Colors is nice too. A little thicker than I like but I'll assume that helps more with sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: collar almost immediately discolored from sunscreen and logos started peeling off within a couple of weeks. Would not recommend or purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: First time washing the logo came off. Not exactly high quality.
customer_reviews.author: MEgginton

customer_reviews.title: Logo comes off after 1 wear
customer_reviews.text: After 1 wear and washing inside out/air drying the logo is coming off terribly! My daughter wanted this for the logo, if I wanted a plain blue rashguard I could have found one a lot cheaper. Very disappointed in quality. I did size up after reading reviews so size is fine. But definitely needed to size up!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: Protects from the dun
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. It was a bit smaller than expected I had hoped it would last longer than a season but great for this summer
customer_reviews.author: NMS

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard
customer_reviews.text: The rash guard is great. The length is good especially since my daughter is on the shorter side. It has a little tighter than I was expecting but not bad at all. It easily fit over her swim top. And worked well when she wore it kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just what my daughter needed to comfortably get in the colder waters
customer_reviews.author: lyn navarro

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 12 years age
customer_reviews.text: Fits way to small for size 16 , my daughter is 12 and a 16 is usually perfect but this runs way tight and small.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Headed to Mexico; buying a second one in white
customer_reviews.text: This is going to provide lots of sun protection when we go to Mexico. My daughter likes it -- she is a tall, fair, string-bean 10-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: JC Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Dirty shirt arrived
customer_reviews.text: Took out of the box and bag and the shirt has dirt all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Not sleepy

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Great material unfortunately this runs small, especially the neck. I couldn’t even get it over my daughters head. She is a true size 8 (kids) recommend sizing up
customer_reviews.author: Dynischa M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 8 year old daughter and this was made for a 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Downing

customer_reviews.title: was As expected
customer_reviews.text: I would say it runs small and not the worst quality but not the best from Roxy.
customer_reviews.author: Keighly Chavis

customer_reviews.title: more of a dirty red/coral
customer_reviews.text: Everyone said how the sizes were way too small. I ordered up one size. That extra was definitely not needed. The quality of the shirt is spot on. Not sure if color displayed is Amazon or Roxys, but the logos are definitely not pink,more of a dirty red/coral
customer_reviews.author: James jones

customer_reviews.title: does not stretch at all
customer_reviews.text: runs small I bought size up and it is hard to get on and off child over head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toooooo small
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this was a child’s size 12. Wouldn’t fit a 3rd grader. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Bonns

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the size 10 for my 10-year-old. This is more like a size 6 or seven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt but runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Good shirt but runs a little small...luckily, I have a younger granddaughter so I will use this one for her and reorder a second in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Love Roxy, but waaaay too small
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Roxy fan and was excited to get this for my daughter for our surf trip to Costa Rica. It was never worn on the trip and we tried to put it on yesterday for a beach trip. I could barely get it over her head and it was almost impossible to get her arms in. Being used to rashguards and wetsuits starting tight and knowing they stretch with water I made her hang in there. She really did try but then complained about it rubbing under her arms. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Roxy Girls ' Big Girl Whole Hearted Long Sleeve Rashguard
product_meta.description: Long sleeve rash guard with soft, resistant stretch fabric.
feature_bullets: Screen print logo on left sleeve and center front
